definitions.definition: used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand or being indicated or experienced.
used to introduce someone or something.
referring to the nearer of two things close to the speaker (the other, if specified, being identified by “that”).
referring to a specific thing or situation just mentioned.
examples: the company was transformed, and Ward had played a vital role in bringing this about

definitions.definition: used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand or being indicated or experienced.
referring to the nearer of two things close to the speaker (the other, if specified, being identified by “that”).
referring to a specific thing or situation just mentioned.
examples: there was a court case resulting from this incident

definitions.definition: used with periods of time related to the present.
examples: I thought you were busy all this week

definitions.definition: referring to a period of time that has just passed.
examples: I haven't left my bed these three days

definitions.definition: used (chiefly in narrative) to refer to a person or thing previously unspecified.
examples: I turned around, and there was this big mummy standing next to us!

definitions.definition: to the degree or extent indicated.
examples: they can't handle a job this big
